original_title: 人妻を虜にする寸止め淫語レズビアン 藍色なぎ 通野未帆
overview: [Aiiro Nagi's first real lesbian] Nagi was forced to move to her husband's new job. In a land where she doesn't know anyone, and her working husband doesn't come back to her house very often, she feels lonely. One day, her neighbor's wife, Miho, who takes care of her, comes to her house. She whispers a frustrated straight married woman into her ear, invites her with obscene words, and falls into lesbian pleasure...! Nasty Married Lesbians who enhance each other with nasty words!
title: The Dirty-Talking Lesbian Who Makes Married Women Her Little Edging Bitches
